markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Death Roll](/Actions.aspx?ID=2279) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 208 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements** The crocodile has a creature [grabbed](/Actions.aspx?ID=2175).

</column>

---

The crocodile tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). If it misses, it releases the creature.
name: Death Roll
requirement: The crocodile has a creature  grabbed .

text: Death Roll Single Action Source Player Core pg. 208 2.0 Requirements The crocodile has a creature grabbed. --- The crocodile tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature prone. If it misses, it releases the creature.
